seo.title: Luxury Real Estate
home.hero.title:
Live where you feel
most alive.
home.hero.subtitle: A refined curation of properties in Portugal for those who value harmony, proximity to nature, and the freedom to breathe.
home.intro_title: More than bricks and mortar. We trade in dreams and legacies.
home.intro_text: From architecture to ambient energy, we curate homes that elevate your standard of living. We don't just sell properties; we connect souls to spaces.
home.about.label: ABOUT US
home.about.text: CIELO – Elevated Living is a value-driven real estate studio rooted in Lisbon and Cascais, with over 10 years of experience shaping meaningful living spaces.
home.about.subtext: More than selling homes, we advocate ethical choices, sustainable living, and a conscious way of inhabiting space—because how you live matters as much as where you live.
home.stats.years_desc: Over a decade of experience in the Portuguese real estate market.
home.stats.satisfaction_desc: Clients trust CIELO and recommend our services based on experience.
home.stats.sales_desc: A growing portfolio of properties sold from north to south of Portugal.
home.stats.homeowners_desc: Families and individuals living in spaces we sold or manage.
home.properties.label: AVAILABLE PROPERTIES
home.properties.title:
Find your Calm.
Find CIELO.
home.expertise.title: Our Expertise
home.expertise.text: A holistic approach integrating market data, deep architectural analysis, and energetic sensitivity.
home.partners.label: OUR PARTNERS
home.partners.title: Created in Collaboration
home.partners.subtitle: Ecosystem
home.partners.text: Our work is supported by a trusted ecosystem of real estate professionals, inspection experts, lawyers, credit consultants, and Feng Shui specialists, ensuring depth, transparency, and peace of mind.

home.testimonials.title:

home.blog.label: ARTICLES & GUIDES
home.faq.title:
Everything you might
want to know.
home.faq.q1: What makes CIELO different from a traditional agency?
home.faq.a1: CIELO operates as a real estate studio rather than a conventional agency. Our focus is on consulting, curation, and long-term relationships—placing as much importance on how a home feels as on its market value.
home.faq.a2: No. At CIELO, we go far beyond transactions. We support our clients with market analysis, property curation, relocation guidance, credit solutions, Feng Shui assessments, and independent inspections.
home.faq.a3: Our studio is based in Lisbon, with a strong presence in Cascais. While these are our core markets, we have extensive experience selling and advising on homes throughout Portugal. We operate under license AMI 12818.
home.faq.q4: How do I start working with CIELO?
home.faq.a4: It all starts with a conversation. We dedicate time to understanding your goals, lifestyle, and priorities before presenting opportunities that truly fit.
home.faq.q5: Do you represent buyers or sellers?
home.faq.a5: We work with both. In all cases, our approach is guided by transparency, ethics, and clear alignment of expectations from the start.
home.faq.q6: Do you work with other agents and professionals?
home.faq.a6: Yes. We collaborate with a selected network of brokers, inspection experts, Feng Shui consultants, lawyers, and financial partners.
home.faq.q7: Do you help with credit and financing solutions?
home.faq.a7: Yes. We collaborate with trusted credit intermediaries and financial institutions to present financing options tailored to your profile, whether you are a resident or non-resident.
home.faq.q8: How do you assess the Feng Shui of a home?
home.faq.a8: Our Feng Shui analysis considers orientation, natural light, circulation, and layout. When necessary, we collaborate with certified consultants to evaluate energy flow and harmony.
home.faq.q9: Can you help after the purchase is complete?
home.faq.a9: Yes. Our relationship doesn't end at the deed. We continue to support clients with post-purchase needs, including renovations, interior design, and utility management.
home.faq.q10: Is the service suitable for investors?
home.faq.a10: Yes. While many clients seek us for their own homes, we also advise investors looking for quality assets, long-term value, and strategic positioning in the Portuguese market.
about.value.label: VALUE PROPOSITION
about.value.title:
Decisions that deserve
time and vision.
about.value.text_1: Cielo believes that real estate decisions deserve time, judgment, and vision. We act with technical rigor, aesthetic sensitivity, and respect for the real value of each property.
about.value.text_2: We do not follow the noise, we do not rush processes, and we do not promise what cannot be sustained. We curate decisions, protect heritage, and build trust with discretion. Because what is truly valuable does not need to be exaggerated.
about.personality.label: BRAND PERSONALITY
about.personality.text: Cielo's personality transcends visual identity; it is the soul that guides our behavior and how we relate to the world. Defining our archetypes allows us to humanize the brand and ensure absolute coherence, ensuring that every interaction, from the first contact to the key delivery, clearly conveys our unique fusion of rigorous technical knowledge and the sensitivity of aesthetic curation.
about.process.title: Our Process

about.process.items.title: Expert Guidance
about.process.items.desc: Precise guidance based on real market data.

about.process.items.title: Transparent Costs
about.process.items.desc: No surprises. Financial clarity from day one.

about.process.items.title: Full Support
about.process.items.desc: Step-by-step management of all legal bureaucracy.

about.process.items.title: Context Analysis
about.process.items.desc: We evaluate the surroundings, climate, and appreciation potential.

about.process.items.title: Local Team
about.process.items.desc: Specialists who live and breathe the local culture.

about.process.items.title: Turnkey Solutions
about.process.items.desc: Properties ready to live in or monetize immediately.

partners.label: Global Network
partners.hero_text: Our strength lies in our partnerships. We join forces with the most prestigious brands in world real estate to offer your asset unparalleled exposure.
partners.collaboration_text: Our work is supported by a trusted ecosystem of real estate professionals, inspection experts, lawyers, credit consultants, and Feng Shui specialists, ensuring depth, transparency, and peace of mind.
partners.sothebys_text: As partners of the Sotheby's International Realty network, we connect your property to the most qualified buyers in the world, combining century-old tradition with marketing innovation.
partners.christies_text: Specialists in properties that are true works of art. Our affiliation with Christie's allows access to an exclusive clientele of international collectors and investors.
partners.maxsell_text: MaxSell is our strategic technology partner.
testimonials.label: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.title:
Stories that
Inspire Trust
testimonials.review_1: We found not just a house, but a home for our new chapter.
testimonials.review_2: The process was transparent and the curation impeccable.
testimonials.review_3: A safe investment and a peaceful summer retreat.
testimonials.review_4: Rare professionalism. They understood exactly what we sought.
testimonials.review_5: The energy of the house changed our lives. Eternal gratitude.
recruitment.hero_subtitle: Be part of excellence in the luxury real estate market.
recruitment.intro_text: We are always looking for exceptional talent. If you have a passion for real estate, excellence in service, and a global vision, we want to meet you.
recruitment.spontaneous_text: Send your CV and cover letter to our team.
footer.title:
Find a home that
matches your life.
footer.text: Whether building from scratch or ready to move, we are here to help you feel at home.
footer.off_market_text: Our most exclusive curation remains confidential. Request access to the Off-Market portfolio to discover unique opportunities.
